item.description: <p>[...] autocomplpop.vimでclass属性値入力時に出るエラーを回避する [...]</p>
item.content:encoded: […] autocomplpop.vimでclass属性値入力時に出るエラーを回避する […]

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ryan.

To: Ryan
Hello. Thank you for your kindness. Your solution is cool!!

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.content:encoded:
You can fix this issue by inserting the following above line 288 of autoload/htmlcomplete.vim:

let classlines = []

I have alerted the developer on his BitBucket project repository: https://bitbucket.org/ns9tks/vim-autocomplpop/issue/37/undefined-variable-classlines-e15-invalid

item.title: By: htmlcomplete#CompleteTags 的 bug | minbaby

item.content:encoded:
In reply to EthanZ6174.

EthanZ6174 Hello. I’m afraid that I’m not author of this plugin, but thank you for the information on your Ubuntu VIM!

item.title: By: EthanZ6174
item.dc:creator: EthanZ6174
item.content:encoded:
are you the author of this plugin?

my vim has this kind of problem too, and my OS is ubuntu…

so… i wanna say, it is not a problem which is windows only…
